detail.text: Search Field: - Text input with search icon - Placeholder: "Search by Stage, Document, Type, or Chapter..." - Allow clear functionality - Positioned above the document table
Search Scope: - Stage column - Document column - Type column - Chapter column
Real-time Filtering: - Documents are filtered as user types - Table updates dynamically based on search input
Clear Search: - Clear button (X) appears when search text is entered - Clicking clear shows all documents again
Empty Search: - When search field is empty, all documents are displayed
Partial Matches: - Search returns documents containing the search term in any of the searchable fields
Pagination: - Pagination updates based on filtered results - Page numbers and total count reflect current filtered data
Performance: - Search filtering is optimized using React useMemo for efficient re-renders
